title: The Thirsty Crow
content: A crow was very thirsty. He flew here and there looking for water, but he couldn't find any. At last, he saw a pitcher with a little water at the bottom. He tried to drink it, but his beak couldn't reach the water. He thought for a while. Then, he saw some pebbles nearby. He picked them up one by one and dropped them into the pitcher. The water level rose, and the crow could finally drink the water.

questions.questionText: Why was the crow flying here and there?
questions.correctAnswer: He was looking for water because he was thirsty.
A pitcher with a little water at the bottom.

questions.questionText: How did the crow manage to drink the water?
questions.correctAnswer: He dropped pebbles into the pitcher to raise the water level.

questions.questionText: How many students are wearing glasses?
What subject is written on the blackboard?
